parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns if a control on the currently active user dialog is enabled. Disabled controls cannot be focused.

Read [[Arma: GUI Configuration]] for more information about user dialogs and controls.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Boolean]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>  '''ctrlEnabled''' idc

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] - control ID

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] -  
true if the control is enabled, false if not.

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[Boolean]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''ctrlEnabled''' controlName

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value>  controlName: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>if (!(ctrlEnabled 100)) then
{
  ctrlEnable [100, true]
};</inner><close></pre></close></ext>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>_enabled = ctrlEnabled _control</inner><close></pre></close></ext>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlEnable]]
</value></part></template>
